links.*: The Book of Lost Tales Part One
The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion
The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[2 January|2]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to the War Office|a letter to the War Office]].
*'''[[12 January|12]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s leave of absence (to recover from his [[wikipedia:trench fever|trench fever]]) ends, but he is far from recovered.
* '''[[23 January|23]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] faces a Medical Board in [[Birmingham]], but he is not deemed fit to return to [[World War I|war]].
==February==
* '''[[27 February|27]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] faces his third Medical Board, and again his leave is extended.
==March==
*'''[[23 March|23]]''' - [[Hans Conried]], who would voice [[Thorin]] in [[The Hobbit (1977 film)|''The Hobbit'' (1977 film)]], is born.

==April==
*'''[[18 April|18]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[Christopher Wiseman]], the Great Twin Brethren, meet in Harrogate, and discuss the fate of the [[T.C.B.S.|Barrovians]] and the future of the Society. 
*'''[[19 April|19]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], in revalidation, is assigned to the Humber Garrison, but is not fit enough.
*Around that time, Tolkien conceives the story of [[Beren and Lúthien]] in a small wood near Roos in Holderness.
*'''[[29 April|29]]''' - [[William Squire]], who would play [[Gandalf]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)]], is born.<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0820109/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_0_tt_0_nm_8_in_0_q_william%2520Squire|articlename=William Squire|website=IMDB|accessed=29 November 2025}}</ref>

==May==
* '''[[1 May|1]]''' - Actress [[Pauline Letts]] is born.
==June==
* '''[[1 June|1]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is considered fit for service again, but he is not reassigned to the Lancashire Fusilliers.
* '''[[18 June|18]]''' - [[Richard Boone]], who would voice [[Smaug]] in [[The Hobbit (1977 film)|''The Hobbit'' (1977 film)]], is born.
* '''[[29 June|29]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] succumbs to gastritis while at Brocton Camp.
==July==
* '''?''' - [[Thomas Kenneth Barnsley]] is killed.<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. lxxviii</ref>

==August==
* '''[[1 August|1]]''' - [[Thomas Kenneth Barnsley|"Tea Cake" Barnsley]] is killed in Ypres, Belgium.
==October==
* '''[[13 October|13]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is found unfit for duty for six months, but able to do a desk job. 
==November==
* '''[[16 November|16]]''' - The Tolkien's first son, [[John Tolkien|John]], is born.
* '''[[24 November|24]]''' - Actor [[John Justin]] is born.
==?==
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] begins work on ''[[The Book of Lost Tales Part One]]''.
